explains: n. 连贯性，条理性；凝聚，凝聚力
wordGroup: coherence length [物]相干长度；相干距离
phase coherence 相位相干性；相位同调性

sentences.en: The anthology has a surprising sense of coherence.
sentences.cn: 该诗集的连贯性令人惊奇。

sentences.en: The campaign was widely criticized for making tactical mistakes and for a lack of coherence.
sentences.cn: 该运动遭到广泛批评，因其有策略错误且缺乏连贯性。

sentences.en: Half a century of town and country planning has enabled it to retain an enviable rural coherence, while still permitting low-density urban living.
sentences.cn: 半个世纪的城镇和乡村规划使它保持了令人羡慕的农村连贯性，同时仍然允许低密度的城市生活。
